title: NFL Football Analytics Dashboard
excerpt: Comprehensive NFL performance analytics experience for coaching and scouting teams. Coming soon.
description:
Status: In planning and early prototyping.

This dashboard distills league, team, and player data into actionable insights for coaching staffs and analysts. Planned modules include drive efficiency breakdowns, situational play-calling heatmaps, and personnel group visualizations backed by a modern data warehouse.

Design explorations and data modeling are underway. The interactive experience, full write-up, and demo environment will follow in a future release.

screenshots.alt: NFL analytics dashboard concept â€“ coming soon
